body: I regret reading this , as a reader its hard. But in real life its easy to move on , even the girl I had a date with have already two kids . Its not realistic for the girl to just go with the flow , indeed ita just a made up story .

@lawman actually the one that is coming with fantasy is you cause Seto may it clear that this story is finished and the MC has moved on. Seto isn't a shit NTR author Seto is a hentai author pure and simple. Also if you want to find out why Seto isn't a hack NTR author go read some of their other works you're be surprised.
@xeinlanzer Nah it was the park all four of them met up on p. 165 at the start of chapter 5.

I just realized there is a bonus page on this original books.
Hmmm, at the last page, seems like 'hori' the male MC still continuing his relationship with 'mika'. 
It shows on hori's smartphone, they are gonna have a usual "date" at kusunoki public park(クスノキ 公園) at 15.00 o'clock . 
Seems like it's safe to say that hori chose mika at the end. I dunno about the new member junior girl, but it seems like hori serious about mika.😳
That orange colored hair guy, asking chitose to do anal sex, but she banned and forbid him. Seems like chitose have some control on their relationship.🤔
Need more Mika. She's way, way, wayyyyy hotter than Chitose. New omake chapter for her plz
I remember the days where I waited months for this unsatisfying story to end

@Kami Nana Now I know why you were trolled so badly in other comment sections. You like to come up with your own fantasy ideas and talk about the feelings of fictional characters like they are actual people. My advice to you is that you should get a life and stop being so delusional about a fictional story. All I said was that the story can be expanded into another arc. If you don't like that, go cry into your pillow because you are nobody to me.

@lawman This is Seto, he's not one of those hack NTR authors you lot seem to love so much. No, it's not from my imagination, its from the way Seto has portrayed the STORY. I know you NTR fans like to ignore story to be able to enjoy usual NTR shit but that doesn't fly with Seto. If Seto wanted to do that, he would have done it. The story is done and Seto has moved on, you should too.

@Kami Nana Seto can direct the story contrary to the reader's opinions. "Hori moved on and doesn't care about Chitose". "The bro isn't going to go after the girl that wants Hori". "He's already with someone and he's not an asshole". These statements come from your own imagination and interpretation. If the artist wants it to happen, it can happen, and Seto Yuuki could do it well in my opinion. If you think Hori has nothing to lose anymore, you need to read more NTR. It's just my opinion that the story can be expanded. How and if it happens is up to the author and publisher.

@lawman How? Hori moved on and doesn't care about shitose anymore. Taka and shitose are together and the bro isn't going to go after the girl that wants Hori because he's already with someone(and he's not an asshole)...and most importantly, Suzu ISN'T shitose. Her already marking her territory on the first day shows she's not like shitose. She knows what she wants and SHE pursues it. Chitose the story is finished as Hori's not even looking at her anymore. Even more importantly, Seto isn't a hack NTR author, so things have to make some sense.
